Talazoparib tosylate is a PARP inhibitor indicated for certain patients with BRCA-mutated advanced or metastatic breast cancer. In general, PARP inhibitors, including talazoparib, are considered beneficial in controlling tumor growth in appropriately selected breast cancer patients rather than worsening patient outcomes. Therefore, the hypothesis that treatment with talazoparib tosylate will worsen patient outcomes is strongly refuted by established clinical use of talazoparib tosylate in improving disease control in some subtypes of breast cancer.
